# vigilo datasets

``` {r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE,INCLUDE=TRUE}

source("../lib/R/file.R")

suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(here)
  library(RSQLite)
  library(forcats)
  library(tidyverse) 
  library(kableExtra)
})


dataset <- read_fwf("dataset.txt")

dataset %>%
  filter(provider=='vigilo') %>%
  kable(format="pipe", escape = FALSE)
```
